statements: SELECT * FROM PatientHealthData WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM PatientHealthData WHERE device_id = 123 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM PatientHealthData GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM PatientHealthData WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM PatientHealthData GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_records > 5;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM PatientHealthData WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND blood_pressure LIKE '120/%';
SELECT * FROM PatientHealthData WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate, AVG(blood_pressure) AS avg_blood_pressure FROM PatientHealthData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM PatientHealthData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientHealthData WHERE heart_rate < 60 OR blood_pressure = '110/70';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, location FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM HealthData WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_name, age, location FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM HealthData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, age, location FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM HealthData WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND temperature < 98.6 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_name, blood_pressure FROM Patients JOIN HealthData ON Patients.patient_id = HealthData.patient_id WHERE heart_rate > 120;
SELECT * FROM monitor_data;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM monitor_data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_info;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM device_info ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT AVG(height) AS average_height, AVG(weight) AS average_weight FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM monitor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM monitor_data WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT d.device_id, d.device_name, p.name FROM device_info d INNER JOIN patient_info p ON d.device_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_info WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY age;
SELECT MAX(height) AS tallest_patient FROM patient_info;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vitals WHERE vital_type = 'Blood Pressure' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM devices WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, vital_type, vital_value FROM patients JOIN vitals ON patients.patient_id = vitals.patient_id WHERE vital_value > 100;
SELECT devices.device_name, devices.location, patients.patient_name FROM devices INNER JOIN patients ON devices.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE devices.status='Active';
SELECT patient_name, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts JOIN patients ON alerts.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE alert_type='Critical';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM health_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT devices.location, health_data.heart_rate FROM devices JOIN health_data ON devices.device_id = health_data.device_id;
SELECT doctors.name, prescriptions.medication FROM doctors JOIN prescriptions ON doctors.doctor_id = prescriptions.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT d.device_type, h.timestamp, p.name FROM devices d INNER JOIN health_data h ON d.device_id=h.device_id INNER JOIN patients p ON h.patient_id=p.id WHERE d.location='Room A';
SELECT h.timestamp, h.heart_rate, h.blood_pressure, d.device_type FROM health_data h INNER JOIN devices d ON h.device_id=d.device_id WHERE h.patient_id=1;

SELECT doc.name AS doctor_name, pat.name AS patient_name, pr.medication, pr.dosage FROM doctors doc INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON doc.doctor_id=pr.doctor_id INNER JOIN patients pat ON pr.patient_id=pat.id WHERE doc.specialization='Cardiology';
